rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0001
rows.name:
To reach the Sanctus Chain, you must
leave the city, pass through Amphoret
Pillar, and descend to the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0002
rows.name:
From there, you must cross the
snowfield and proceed through
the Great Pillar Passage.

rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I am aware that we are in no
position to ask this of you,
but... we're counting on you...
